ygData.subject: RE: [neat] Self-adaptive Mutation Rates, Novelty Search and CMA-ES
ygData.msgSnippet: Aside from NS, this raises some interesting possibilities. Perhaps with simply adding a Stochastic Bias Neuron (SBN), NEAT can evolve an ANN to exploit
